welcome.title: Welcome to DatuGaming! We are passionate about providing a unique experience in the world of digital gaming
welcome.description: Founded with the goal of providing gamers with easy and safe access to the best PC titles, our mission is to deliver high-quality products and exceptional customer service.

catalog.title: Large Catalog
catalog.description: We offer thousands of games directly from the world's biggest publishers, including new releases, pre-orders, and the most famous and beloved titles and franchises.

support.title: Real Support
support.description: Our support team consists of real, passionate gamers who do everything they can to assist you with any issues or questions. Your contact is always handled with care.

available.title: Always Available
available.description: Your content is always accessible. Log into your account, find your games, manage your library, and enjoy everything we offer, handcrafted just for you.

global.title: Global and Local
global.description: Our goal is to be local, creating and offering unique content and campaigns, localization, and special pricing for each region we operate in.

mission.subtitle: Our mission
mission.title: We are a dedicated team of gaming enthusiasts and technology professionals. Our commitment is to ensure that you have access to the latest releases and most popular games with maximum ease and security.
mission.description: We are constantly updating our catalog to include the latest news and the most desired titles. Our Vision We believe that every gamer deserves a simple and enjoyable shopping experience

cart.title: Add Games to Your Cart
cart.description: Select your favorite games, add them to your cart, and complete your purchase with total security.

access.title: Access Your Games
access.description: Go to your account to find and access your games.

install.title: Install and Play
install.description: Install your game on your computer and start playing right away!

enjoy.title: Enjoy convenience, speed, and great prices! Search, discover, and access titles from the world's biggest publishers and top indie releases.

accordion.answer1: A cryptocurrency exchange is a platform that allows the purchase, sale, and exchange of cryptocurrencies. Users can exchange digital currencies for other digital currencies or for fiat currencies such as the dollar or euro.
accordion.question2: How does the exchange integration work on my platform?
accordion.answer2: Our exchange integration works through secure API connections that allow real-time trading between platforms.
accordion.question3: What are the requirements for integration?
accordion.answer3: You'll need API keys from your exchange account and a server with HTTPS.
accordion.question4: How long does it take to integrate an exchange?
accordion.answer4: Integration typically takes between 1-3 business days.
